props.allowOverflow: Removes overflow re-positioning for the content
props.attach: Specifies which DOM element that this component should detach to.String can be any valid querySelector and Object can be any valid Node. This will attach to the root (MApp)[/components/apps] component by default.
props.closeOnClick: Designates if menu should close on outside-activator click
props.closeOnContentClick: Designates if menu should close when its content is clicked
props.contentClass: Applies a custom class to the detached element. This is useful because the content is moved to the beginning of the (MApp)[/components/apps] component (unless the `Attach` prop is provided) and is not targettable by classes passed directly on the component.
props.externalActivator: Detaches the menu content inside of the component as opposed to the document.
props.nudgeBottom: Nudge the content to the bottom
props.nudgeLeft: Nudge the content to the left
props.nudgeRight: Nudge the content to the right
props.nudgeTop: Nudge the content to the top
props.offsetOverflow: Causes the component to flip to the opposite side when repositioned due to overflow
props.offsetX: Offset the menu on the x-axis. Works in conjunction with direction left/right
props.offsetY: Offset the menu on the y-axis. Works in conjunction with direction top/bottom
props.openDelay: Milliseconds to wait before opening component. Only works with the `OpenOnHover` prop
props.openOnClick: Designates whether menu should open on activator click
props.openOnFocus: Specifies whether to open the menu when the cursor is selected
props.openOnHover: Designates whether menu should open on activator hover
props.origin: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation (for transition origin)[https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin].
props.positionX: Used to position the content when not using an activator slot
props.positionY: Used to position the content when not using an activator slot
props.transition: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in transitions](/blazor/styles-and-animations/transitions) or one your own.
props.value: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
props.zIndex: The z-index used for the component
